mainDashboard.comment: This defines the main system dashboard

alerts.description: All alerts specific to this user
alerts.template: <list><% for (var itemIndex in this) { %><% var item = this[itemIndex]; var date = new Date(item.date); %><list-item><string border><% (date.getMonth() + 1) + '/' + date.getDate() + '/' + ( date.getYear() % 100 ) + ': ' + item.alert %></string></list-item><% } %></list>

myMedications.description: All medications specific to this user
myMedications.template: <% var images = {'good': '/public/icons/happy.png', 'bad': '/public/icons/sad.png'}; %><offset size="20" /><grid><% for (var statusIndex in this) { %><% var status = this[statusIndex]; %><column><string center><% status.number %></string></column><% } %></grid><grid><% for (var statusIndex in this) { %><% var status = this[statusIndex]; var date = new Date(status.date); %><column><string center><% (date.getMonth() + 1) + '/' + date.getDate() + '/' + ( date.getYear() % 100 ) %></string><image source="<% images[status.kind.toLowerCase()] %>" /><string center><% status.kind %></string></column><% } %></grid>

howAmI.description: All mood records specific to this user
howAmI.template: <% var images = {'good': '/public/icons/happy.png', 'bad': '/public/icons/sad.png'}; %><offset size="20" /><grid><% for (var statusIndex in this) { %><% var status = this[statusIndex]; %><column><string center><% status.type %></string></column><% } %></grid><grid><% for (var statusIndex in this) { %><% var status = this[statusIndex]; var date = new Date(status.date); %><column><string center><% (date.getMonth() + 1) + '/' + date.getDate() + '/' + ( date.getYear() % 100 ) %></string><image source="<% images[status.kind.toLowerCase()] %>" /><string center><% status.kind %></string></column><% } %></grid>

diet.description: All diet entries specific to this user
diet.template: <% var images = {'good': '/public/icons/happy.png', 'bad': '/public/icons/sad.png'}; %><offset size="20" /><grid><% for (var statusIndex in this) { %><% var status = this[statusIndex]; %><column><string center><% status.meal %></string></column><% } %></grid><grid><% for (var statusIndex in this) { %><% var status = this[statusIndex]; var date = new Date(status.date); %><column><string center><% (date.getMonth() + 1) + '/' + date.getDate() + '/' + ( date.getYear() % 100 )%></string><image source="<% images[status.kind.toLowerCase()] %>" /><string center><% status.kind %></string></column><% } %></grid>

remindersAndAppointments.description: All reminders and appointments specific to this user
remindersAndAppointments.template: <list><% for (var itemIndex in this) { %><% var item = this[itemIndex]; %><list-item><string border><% item %></string></list-item><% } %></list>

myGlucoseLevel.description: All glucose level records specific to this user
myGlucoseLevel.template: <list><list-item><string>Last 3:</string><grid><% for (var itemIndex in this.slice(0, 3)) { var item = this[itemIndex]; %><column><circle><% item %></circle></column><% } %></grid></list-item><list-item><string>Average:</string><circle><% Math.round(this.reduce(function(a, v) { return a + v; }, 0) / this.length) %></circle></list-item></list>

myBloodPressure.description: All blood pressure records specific to this user
myBloodPressure.template: <list><list-item><string>Last 3:</string><grid><% for (var itemIndex in this.slice(0, 3)) { var item = this[itemIndex]; %><column><circle><fraction><% item[0] %>/<% item[1] %></fraction></circle></column><% } %></grid></list-item><list-item><string>Average:</string><circle><fraction><% Math.round(this.reduce(function(a, b) { return a + b[0]; }, 0) / this.length) %>/<% Math.round(this.reduce(function(a, b) { return a + b[1]; }, 0) / this.length) %></fraction></circle></list-item></list>

activities.description: All activities specific to this user
activities.template: <list><% for (var itemIndex in this) { %><% var item = this[itemIndex]; %><list-item><string border><% item %></string></list-item><% } %></list>
